system.sustained:
Everyone within power's range except the Psyker make Opposed Willpower Tests vs Psyker's Willpower, each that lose take 1d10 + Psy Rating non-permenant Characteristic Damage to random Characteristic,  +2 damage and 1 Insanity per Degree of Success Psyker made vs Target. Effect can be dodged as with an Area of Effect Ranaged attack.
Note: Randomly choose characteristic with 1d10 (WS, BS, S, T, AG, INT, PER, WP, FEL), rerolling 0's
